#### List of abbreviations
  
##### Sets of features 
* __sAggrDRM__: seasonal aggregates v2.0 (day-referenced mean)
* __sAggrP6__: seasonal aggregates v3.0 (6-period time division)

##### Datasets
* __goi__: GoiEner (including Megara and La Corriente) [ES]

##### Clustering methods
* __som__: self-organizing maps

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis', message=FALSE}
# Features loop
ff_loop <- params$ff
# Dataset loop
key     <- unique(unlist(lapply(params$dd, `[[`, 1)))
len_key <- length(key)
dd_name <- ifelse(len_key == 1, key, paste0(len_key, "ds")) 
dd_loop <- dd_name
# Methods loop
mm_loop <- params$mm
# FEATURE LOOP
for (ff in ff_loop) {
  # DATASET LOOP
  for (dd in dd_loop) {
    # METHOD LOOP
    for (mm in mm_loop) {
      cat(paste0("## ", ff, " > ", dd, " > ", mm, "\n\n"))
      # Initialization of txt_list
      txt_list <- list(img = rep("", 42), cap = rep("", 42))
      # CLUSTER LOOP
      cc_loop <- 1:params$cc
      
      for (cc in cc_loop) {
        # Get index
        cc_idx <- cc #(cc - 1) %% 12 + 1
        # Path to file
        card_path <- paste0(hmp_path, "hmp_", ff, "_", dd, "_", mm, "_",
                            max(cc_loop), "cl_i-", cc, ".png")
        # Load variable "idx"
        idx_path <- paste0(hmm_path, "hmm_", ff, "_", dd, "_", mm, "_",
                            max(cc_loop), "cl_i-", cc, ".RData")
        load(idx_path)
        
        # Complete txt_list
        if (file.exists(card_path)) {
          txt_list$img[cc_idx] <- paste0("![](", card_path, ")")
        } else {
          txt_list$img[cc_idx] <- no_file
        }
        txt_list$cap[cc_idx] <- paste0(
          ff, " > ", 
          dd, " > ", 
          mm, " > ", 
          "#", cc, "\n\n",
          sum(idx), " TS (", round(100*sum(idx)/length(idx),1), "%)\n\n"
        )
        # Print HTML table
        if (cc_idx == max(cc_loop)) {
          cat(table_of_cards(txt_list))
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```
